name: Pirates Coin Ship
description:
The most exciting pirate dozer game ever!

Pirate Coin Ship with a built in casino offers an easy to play but hard to put down coin pushing experience.

Play like a Pirate, drop constant flow of coins, attack with ship cannons, spin casino style slots, try your luck at fortune wheel and quest through the seven seas and advance through ocean by unlocking wonderful items and powers.

Pirates Coin Ship features:
- Dozens of pirates collectables!
- Monthly live events and special adorable characters!
- World Class 3D graphics to relive a pirate life.
- Special quests where antique collectables help unlock upgrades
- Superb coin dozer physics, special effects and animations
- Fun chips with unique pusher powers that can be upgraded
- One Arm Bandit: Our slots machine mini-game to win tons of prizes
- Dead Man's Fortune Wheel: Spin the wheel of fortune to win special rewards
- Compete on leaderboards and unlock achievements
- Look out for awesome new updates!

Visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/coinparty and join our active community of players!
